Comment: This is simply the latest act in Trump's wanton destruction of the federal government's capacity to serve our nation's interests. There can be no rational justification for the elimination of a program that costs $32 million/year while enabling consumers to save $40 billion/year in energy costs.  Abraham Lincoln wrote: ‚ÄúThe legitimate object of government, is to do for a community of people, whatever they need to have done, but can not do, at all, or can not, so well do, for themselves‚Äîin their separate, and individual capacities.‚Äù  While it may remain possible for individuals to do the in-depth research needed to compare consumer appliances' efficiency, a government program that requires the clear labeling of appliances is something that I think Lincoln would have supported.  In November 2026, it is essential that every Republican be voted out of office. In 2027, the new House should then immediately impeach Trump and begin the process of rebuilding our nation.
